pullrequest.title: Disable failing jobs: rendering and sdf8 packages

content.raw:
These jobs are failing because these debs are only in the prerelease repo. I had started thinking about adding separate jobs for testing our prerelease packages, but all I've written is the following:

~~~
diff -r 00b2f5943e83 jenkins-scripts/dsl/ignition.dsl
--- a/jenkins-scripts/dsl/ignition.dsl	Wed Sep 19 14:16:13 2018 -0700
+++ b/jenkins-scripts/dsl/ignition.dsl	Mon Sep 24 10:37:34 2018 -0700
@@ -30,6 +30,13 @@
                                 'msgs'       : [ '1' ],
                                 'rendering'  : [ '1' ],
                                 'transport'  : [ '3','4' ]]
+ignition_prerelease_pkgs    = [ 'cmake'      : [ '1', '2' ],
+                                'common'     : [ '2', '3' ],
+                                'gui'        : [ '1' ],
+                                'math'       : [ '5', '6' ],
+                                'msgs'       : [ '2', '3' ],
+                                'rendering'  : [ '1' ],
+                                'transport'  : [ '5','6' ]]
 // physics/sensors don't need to be included since they use default for gz11
 ignition_prerelease_branches = [ 'cmake'     : [ 'gz11' ],
                                  'common'    : [ 'gz11' ],
~~~
content.html:
These jobs are failing because these debs are only in the prerelease repo. I had started thinking about adding separate jobs for testing our prerelease packages, but all I've written is the following:

diff -r 00b2f5943e83 jenkins-scripts/dsl/ignition.dsl
--- a/jenkins-scripts/dsl/ignition.dsl  Wed Sep 19 14:16:13 2018 -0700
+++ b/jenkins-scripts/dsl/ignition.dsl  Mon Sep 24 10:37:34 2018 -0700
@@ -30,6 +30,13 @@
                                 'msgs'       : [ '1' ],
                                 'rendering'  : [ '1' ],
                                 'transport'  : [ '3','4' ]]
+ignition_prerelease_pkgs    = [ 'cmake'      : [ '1', '2' ],
+                                'common'     : [ '2', '3' ],
+                                'gui'        : [ '1' ],
+                                'math'       : [ '5', '6' ],
+                                'msgs'       : [ '2', '3' ],
+                                'rendering'  : [ '1' ],
+                                'transport'  : [ '5','6' ]]
 // physics/sensors don't need to be included since they use default for gz11
 ignition_prerelease_branches = [ 'cmake'     : [ 'gz11' ],
                                  'common'    : [ 'gz11' ],
